Member Enumeration Documentation

enum AudioError::ErrorType
 

The audio error types The AudioErrorMsg APOXI message containing the error type will be sent when an error occur

Enumerator:
ErrorUnknown  Unknown.
ErrorResourceInUse  Resourse in use.
ErrorResourceConflict  Resource conflict.
ErrorHandleNotUsed  Handle not used.
ErrorNoHwSupport  No hardware support.
ErrorSharingViolation  Sharing violation.
ErrorParameterOutOfRange  Parameter out of range.
ErrorFormatNotSupported  Format not supported.
ErrorAudioDriverDisabled  Audio driver is disabled.
ErrorRingerToneError  Ringer tone error.
ErrorVmFFSProblems  FFS problems.
ErrorVmPerformanceProblems  Voice memo performance problems.
ErrorRingerSuspendresumeError  Ringer suspend resume error.
ErrorMissingDspResource  Missing DSP resource.
ErrorUnknownPosition  Unknown position.
ErrorNoPlayback  No playback error.
ErrorNoPlaytime  No playtime.
ErrorPerformanceProblems
